posts.message:
We look for php developer 1 to 3 years experience.
Good understanding of software engineering concepts.
Decent problem solving, algorithms, and research skills.
Knowledge of common web technologies.
Basic JavaScript skills.
Basic HTML and CSS skills.
Familiarity with jQuery.
Familiarity with PHP MVC frameworks (Cakephp, CodeIgniter).
Familiarity with CMS (Joomla, Wordpress).
